attributes.action: Amend the Town and Country Planning Act 1995 ( Use Classes Order) to safeguard family housing units.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Vast areas of our major cities are dominated by Houses in Multiple Occupation. 
Families move out to escape the slum like areas, and the detriment to their residential amenities.
There needs to be a Planning policy to restrict the spread of Houses in Multiple Occupation which house six or fewer residents and safeguard family  housing units for future generations.
In the Houses in Multiple Occupation ghettos there is increased fear of crime as the fleeing long term residents
leave a short term population who have little interest in residents action or Neighbourhood Watch.
These are unsustainable communities and a Use Classes Order needs to be implemented whereby family homes are protected so that familes can enjoy life in our cities in the future.
